title: how can i talk to a riot employee
body: i need to talk to a riot employee about a former league account

replies.body:
Greetings
Guys im from IRAQ and I'm playing the game for a 3 or 4 years and some times we have a service problem for this i had a AFK low priority for a 20m . You know how much thats bad and all of that because the service not because of me.  So please I'm asking you to cancel that penalty i will be thanksfull for your help.

Since you're interested in a specific account and information related to it, I recommend you reach out in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) Account information is sensitive, so we try to avoid stating specific information here on the boards.

Let me know if you have any questions.
